sources.title: Q3 2024 Sales Report
sources.content: Total revenue reached $4.2M in Q3 2024, representing a 28% increase year-over-year. The APAC region contributed $2.1M (50% of total), Europe $1.3M (31%), and North America $800K (19%). New product line launched in August generated $600K in first month.

sources.title: Customer Feedback Survey
sources.content: Customer satisfaction scores: Product quality 4.5/5, Customer service 4.7/5, Delivery speed 4.2/5. Top requests: Mobile app (67%), International shipping (54%), Loyalty program (48%). Net Promoter Score increased from 42 to 58.

sources.title: Market Analysis Report
sources.content: Market share grew from 12% to 15% in Q3. Main competitor reduced prices by 10%, but we maintained premium positioning. Industry growth rate 8% annually. Opportunity identified in Southeast Asian markets with 200% projected growth.

task.focus: Create executive summary with strategic recommendations
